title: ENGINE TO CREATE JSON BASED ON THE FINALISED DSS FILES - P&C WE

task_list.instruction_title:
Please create the JSON extracts for SECLI team based on  the last finlaised snapshot of DSS files  
(AllDss.json + Headers.csv)

The DSS files are available on the following link : 

[https://spconfidential/projects/toronto-it/07%20%20Cutover/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fprojects%2Ftoronto%2Dit%2F07%20%20Cutover%2F09%20%2D%20Files%2FDSS](https://spconfidential/projects/toronto-it/07%20%20Cutover/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fprojects%2Ftoronto%2Dit%2F07%20%20Cutover%2F09%20%2D%20Files%2FDSS)




The DSS for each source application are in their respective folders :
_- For S2i in the folder \"S2i\" : [https://spconfidential/projects/toronto-it/07%20%20Cutover/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fprojects%2Ftoronto%2Dit%2F07%20%20Cutover%2F09%20%2D%20Files%2FDSS%2FS2i](https://spconfidential/projects/toronto-it/07%20%20Cutover/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fprojects%2Ftoronto%2Dit%2F07%20%20Cutover%2F09%20%2D%20Files%2FDSS%2FS2i)


 - - For AVALOQ in the folder \"AVALOQ\" : [https://spconfidential/projects/toronto-it/07%20%20Cutover/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fprojects%2Ftoronto%2Dit%2F07%20%20Cutover%2F09%20%2D%20Files%2FDSS%2FAVALOQ](https://spconfidential/projects/toronto-it/07%20%20Cutover/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fprojects%2Ftoronto%2Dit%2F07%20%20Cutover%2F09%20%2D%20Files%2FDSS%2FAVALOQ)


 - - For Bank and Priv DMS in the folder \"Bank_Priv_DMS\" : [https://spconfidential/projects/toronto-it/07%20%20Cutover/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fprojects%2Ftoronto%2Dit%2F07%20%20Cutover%2F09%20%2D%20Files%2FDSS%2FBank%5FPriv%5FDMS](https://spconfidential/projects/toronto-it/07%20%20Cutover/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fprojects%2Ftoronto%2Dit%2F07%20%20Cutover%2F09%20%2D%20Files%2FDSS%2FBank%5FPriv%5FDMS)


 - - For GED files in the folder \"GED\" : [https://spconfidential/projects/toronto-it/07%20%20Cutover/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fprojects%2Ftoronto%2Dit%2F07%20%20Cutover%2F09%20%2D%20Files%2FDSS%2FGED](https://spconfidential/projects/toronto-it/07%20%20Cutover/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fprojects%2Ftoronto%2Dit%2F07%20%20Cutover%2F09%20%2D%20Files%2FDSS%2FGED)



_- For Miscellenous files in the fodler \"MISC\" : [https://spconfidential/projects/toronto-it/07%20%20Cutover/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fprojects%2Ftoronto%2Dit%2F07%20%20Cutover%2F09%20%2D%20Files%2FDSS%2FMISC](https://spconfidential/projects/toronto-it/07%20%20Cutover/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fprojects%2Ftoronto%2Dit%2F07%20%20Cutover%2F09%20%2D%20Files%2FDSS%2FMISC)
